snippet.title: Lalaloopsy Land game for Android: video-review
snippet.description:
Download for free from Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.appsministry.lalaloopsy
Welcome to the amazing 3D world based on the Lalaloopsy dolls that are extremely popular across Europe and The United States. Each Lala doll has a unique look, dress mood and favorite game.
 
In the Lalaloopsy game, you will be able to:

 - collect adorable Lalaloopsy dolls, take them for a walk, dress them up
 - play mini-games and get cookies as reward
 - innovate and upgrade the land
 - complete daily quests and get rewards!
 
Welcome to amazing Lalaloopsy Land!

«Lalaloopsy» at Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Lalaloopsy-Game/435968746552228
«Lalaloopsy» at vk : https://vk.com/lalaloopsy3d
 
Our site: http://appsministry.com/?lang=en

Our accounts in social networks:
Vk: http://vk.com/appsministry
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/appsmin
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Apps_Ministry
